highlights.headline: Memphis Grizzlies vs. Orlando Magic: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Memphis Grizzlies vs. Orlando Magic: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Memphis Grizzlies vs. Orlando Magic: Game Highlights) 2026/01/15 ESHEET

headlines.description: Paolo Banchero had 26 points and 13 rebounds, Franz Wagner had 18 points and nine rebounds in his return to the Magic lineup, and Orlando beat the Memphis Grizzlies 118-111 on Thursday in the NBA's first regular-season game in Germany.
headlines.shortLinkText: Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner lead Magic past Grizzlies 118-111 in Berlin

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Phoenix Suns vs. Detroit Pistons: Game Highlights) 2026/01/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: Duncan Robinson scored 19 points, Jalen Duren had 16 points and 18 rebounds and the Detroit Pistons rallied to beat the Phoenix Suns 108-105 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: East-leading Pistons rally to beat short-handed Suns 108-105 for 4th win in 5 games

highlights.headline: Boston Celtics vs. Miami Heat: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Boston Celtics vs. Miami Heat: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Boston Celtics vs. Miami Heat: Game Highlights) 2026/01/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: Anfernee Simons scored 18 of his season-high 39 points in the fourth quarter, Jaylen Brown added 27 and the Boston Celtics trailed most of the way before rallying to beat the Miami Heat 119-114 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Simons scores 39 points off the bench, Brown adds 27 and Celtics rally to stun Heat 119-114

headlines.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 20 points, Chet Holmgren added 18 and the Oklahoma City Thunder pulled away in the fourth quarter to beat the Houston Rockets 111-91 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thunder surge in fourth quarter to defeat Rockets 111-91

events.name: Milwaukee Bucks at San Antonio Spurs

highlights.headline: Wemby, Spurs blow out Giannis and the Bucks
highlights.description: Victor Wembanyama records a 22-point double-double as the Spurs blow out the Bucks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wemby, Spurs blow out Giannis and the Bucks) 2026/01/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: Victor Wembanyama returned from a first-quarter injury scare to score 22 points and grab 10 rebounds and lead the San Antonio Spurs to a 119-101 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wembanyama returns from injury scare to fuel Spurs past Bucks, 119-101

headlines.description: Klay Thompson matched his season high with six 3-pointers and moved into fourth place on career list, scoring a season-best 26 points to help the Dallas Mavericks beat the Utah Jazz 144-122 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thompson scores 26 points, moves up 3-point list, as Flagg-less Mavericks cruise past Jazz, 144-122

events.name: New York Knicks at Golden State Warriors

headlines.description: Jimmy Butler had 32 points and eight rebounds, Stephen Curry warmed up in the second half to finish with 27 points and seven assists, and the Golden State Warriors beat the New York Knicks 126-113 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Butler, Curry, Moody give Warriors three scorers with 20 or more points in 126-113 win over Knicks

events.name: Charlotte Hornets at Los Angeles Lakers

highlights.description: Charlotte Hornets vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Charlotte Hornets vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Game Highlights) 2026/01/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: LaMelo Ball scored 27 of his 30 points in the second half while tying his career high with nine 3-pointers, and the Charlotte Hornets overcame Luka Doncic's 39 points for a 135-117 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: LaMelo Ball hits 9 3-pointers to lead Hornets to surprising 135-117 win over Luka's Lakers
